trans-unit.source: Specifies the behavior of the object context when the <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges(System.Data.Objects.SaveOptions)" /> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 指定呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges(System.Data.Objects.SaveOptions)" /> 方法時的物件內容行為。

trans-unit.source: After changes are saved, the <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.AcceptAllChangesAfterSave" /> method is called, which resets change tracking in the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 儲存變更後會呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.AcceptAllChangesAfterSave" /> 方法，這個方法會重設 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager" /> 中的變更追蹤。

trans-unit.source: Before changes are saved, the <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.DetectChanges" /> method is called to synchronize the property values of objects that are attached to the object context with data in the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 在儲存變更前會呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.DetectChanges" /> 方法，以將附加至物件內容之物件的屬性值與 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager" /> 中的資料進行同步處理。

trans-unit.source: Changes are saved without the <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.DetectChanges" /> or the <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.AcceptAllChangesAfterSave" /> methods being called.
trans-unit.target: 在不呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.DetectChanges" /> 或 <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.AcceptAllChangesAfterSave" /> 方法的情況下儲存變更。
